original_title: The Dreamer That Remains: A Portrait of Harry Partch
overview: The Dreamer That Remains is a documentary produced by Betty Freeman and directed by Stephen Pouliot in 1972. Here is the director’s original cut along with his commentary. If you’ve never seen Partch or his instruments before, this is the place to start.
title: The Dreamer That Remains: A Portrait of Harry Partch
